metadata.title: CVE-2024-42459 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Elliptic package 6.5.6 for Node.js, EDDSA signature malleabilityoccurs because there is a missing signature length check, and thuszero-valued bytes can be removed or appended.

criterions.comment: node-elliptic package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
